spec.description: Percent used space on the root partition of at least one node has exceeded the alarm threshold.
spec.name: NSM Disk High Usage
spec.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf/so_short_term")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")
